name: Unchained
title: We Already Had an Alt Season—You Just Didn’t Sell - Bits + Bips w/ Sal Ternullo
text:
Synopsis
The crypto market experienced a brief alt season with significant price movements, but many investors failed to capitalize on the opportunity due to psychological attachment to their investments.

Key Insights
- Crypto assets saw price increases of 50% to multiple times their original value within a four-week period
- The price surge was considered an "alt season" despite not being sustained long-term
- Investor psychology and emotional attachment prevented many from selling at peak prices
- The market movement was characterized by rapid but short-lived price appreciation
